#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

long long gcd(long long a, long long b)
{
	if (b == 0)
		return a;
	else
		return gcd(b, a % b);
}

int main(void)
{
	long long A[100005], temp, N, i;
	
	scanf("%lld",&N);
	
	for(i=0; i<N; i++)
	scanf("%lld",&A[i]);
	
	for (i= 0; i + 1 < 4; i++)
	{
		if (i == 0)
			temp = gcd(A[i], A[i + 1]);
		else
			temp = gcd(temp, A[i + 1]);
	}
	
	while(temp%2==0)
	temp/=2;
	
	printf("%lld\n",temp);
	
	return 0;
}
